channel.title: WSL2 on Don Figuerres
channel.description: Recent content in WSL2 on Don Figuerres

item.title: Dark Theme in WSL2 GUI
item.description: Running GUI apps in WSL2 has finally been made easier in more recent versions of Windows 11 and Windows 10 with WSL2. If you’re like me, who use Windows as a daily driver for software development, you know that this makes life a bit easier. Before the recent updates, you had to install an X Server and that is what you set as your display in your WSL2 environment - a bit old school.
